Instruction.Message: In this experiment, you are going to see black boxes floating in front of you. For brief durations on the order of a fraction of a second, these boxes will display letters. You are asked to report the letters after each trial by typing them in. You are asked to report only near letters and ignore far letters if any. Press A when you are ready to continue

To become familiar with the procedure, you are now going to perform a few practice trials. At the beginning of each trial, fixate on the cross in the center of the screen and try to memorize the letters that will appear briefly afterwards.
You will notice that the trials differ in difficulty. Display durations are always short but some are even shorter than others. In this practice block, you will receive individual feedback after each trial. You will not receive such feedback in the following blocks.
Press A when you are ready to start the first trial
